ARu.caption: layout
ARu.doc: an object specifying the way participantsâ€™ videos are laid out in the live stream.
ARu.name: layout

ARv.caption: user id
ARv.doc: If using the single-participant layout, specify the user id of the participant that the single participant layout should focus on. You can set a user id with the daily - create meeting token action.
ARv.name: user_id

ARx.caption: If using the single-participant layout, specify the user id of the single participant. Set a user id with the Daily - create meeting token action.
ARx.name: singleParticipantInfo

ARy.caption: To unlock this action, you'll need to add a credit card to your account. Visit https://dashboard.daily.co/billing to learn more about pricing and add your credit card details.
ARy.name: scaleplanonly

ARz.caption: max streams
ARz.doc: Specify the number of max streams in the recording (from 1-9). The default value is 9.
ARz.name: maxstreams

ASB.caption: If using the portrait layout, you can specify the variant. The default is vertical which will display the call grid style. Inset will have one participant's video take up the entire screen and the other in a smaller rectangle.
ASB.name: portraitinfo

ASD.caption: height
ASD.doc: Specified to control the resolution of the live stream. The value must be even, i.e., a multiple of 2.
ASD.name: heightRecording

ASE.caption: width
ASE.doc: Specified to control the resolution of the live stream. The value must be even, i.e., a multiple of 2
ASE.name: widthRecording

ASF.caption: background color
ASF.doc: Specifies the background color of the stream, formatted as #rrggbb or #aarrggbb string.
ASF.name: backgroundColor

ASG.caption: video bitrate
ASG.doc: Specifies the video bitrate in kilobits per second (kbps) to use for video output. Value can range between 10 and 10000
ASG.name: videoBitrate

ASH.caption: audio bitrate
ASH.doc: Specifies the audio bitrate in kilobits per second (kbps) to use for audio output. Value can range between 10 and 320
ASH.name: audioBitrate

ASI.caption: Below are optional advanced recording settings to further configure the recording experience.
ASI.name: advanced_settings

ASK.caption: min Idle time out
ASK.doc: Amount of time in seconds to wait before ending a recording or live stream when the room is idle (e.g. when all users have muted video and audio).
ASK.name: minIdleTimeOut

ASL.caption: fps
ASL.doc: Specifies the video frame rate per second.
ASL.name: fps

ASM.caption: RTMP URL
ASM.doc: The RTMP URL for the stream
ASM.name: endpoints

ASN.caption: maxDuration
ASN.doc: maximum duration in seconds after which recording/streaming is forcefully stopped. Defaults: 10800 seconds (3 hours) for recordings
ASN.name: maxDuration
